description: A college-level course exploring the core principles of biology, from biochemistry and evolution to complex ecosystems. Aligned with the AP curriculum to prepare students for the exam.

lessons.title: Chemistry of Life
lessons.description: Building blocks of life, water properties, and macromolecules

lessons.title: Cell Structure and Function
lessons.description: Prokaryotic vs eukaryotic cells, organelles, and membrane transport

lessons.title: Cellular Energetics
lessons.description: Enzymes, ATP, cellular respiration, and photosynthesis

lessons.title: Cell Communication and Cell Cycle
lessons.description: Signal transduction, cell cycle regulation, and mitosis

lessons.title: Heredity
lessons.description: Meiosis, Mendelian genetics, and inheritance patterns

lessons.title: Gene Expression and Regulation
lessons.description: DNA structure, transcription, translation, and gene regulation

lessons.title: Natural Selection
lessons.description: Evolution, evidence of evolution, and population genetics

lessons.title: Ecology
lessons.description: Population dynamics, communities, ecosystems, and conservation
